titles.title: Student Loan Interest Full Deductibility Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the limitations on the maximum amount of the deduction of interest on education loans.
Student Loan Interest Full Deductibility Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Student Loan Interest Full Deductibility Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the current dollar limitations on the tax deduction of interest on education loans.
